LanguageData.SocialWealth_Settings_ChangeThreshold_Ti:
Changes in ideo certainty below this fraction won't be wealth adjusted.

This is for performance as if set too low it happens on almost every tick

0.01 is probably fine or even lower but simply adjust this up to have lower performance impact

The larger it is the fewer places wealth will affect ideo certainty.
